definition: Longyangxia canyon on the upper reaches of the Yellow River, Gonghe county 共和縣|共和县[Gong4 he2 xian4] in Hainan Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Qinghai

sentences.english: Taking Longyangxia as an actual example, a comprehensive health diagnosis structure system is established.
sentences.chinese: 結合龍羊峽具體工程，建立了健康綜合診斷結構體系。
